title: Why judiciary in gujarat so compromised
selftext:
The sesssion court judge in rahul gandhi defamation case was amit shah lawyer in sohrabuddin encounter case

[https://thewire.in/law/surat-judge-hearing-rahul-gandhis-appeal-was-amit-shahs-lawyer-in-2006-fake-encounter-case](https://thewire.in/law/surat-judge-hearing-rahul-gandhis-appeal-was-amit-shahs-lawyer-in-2006-fake-encounter-case) (session court judge)

The high court judge, who will give the judgement , was maya kodnani lawyer. The same maya kodnani who led mob in 2002 riots

[https://thewire.in/law/gujarat-high-court-judge-hemant-prachak-rahul-gandhi-maya-kodnani](https://thewire.in/law/gujarat-high-court-judge-hemant-prachak-rahul-gandhi-maya-kodnani) (high court judge)

Also many judges are recusing themselves from hearing rahul gandhi defamation case. I mean it is not even some murder case. But they are scared to hear his case because if they rule in his favour, their life will be destroyed like judge muralidhar.

[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/gujarat-hc-judge-recuses-herself-from-hearing-rahul-gandhis-case/articleshow/99791219.cms](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/gujarat-hc-judge-recuses-herself-from-hearing-rahul-gandhis-case/articleshow/99791219.cms)

I am damn sure , the high court judge , who was lawyer of maya kodnani will rule in favour of bjp. So for relief , they will have to go supreme court. But the hypocrisy is , khusbu sundar made exact same tweet and she is now in bjp. Bjp itself doesnt find anything wrong in it.

Most people dont know but the judge who gave life sentence to maya kodnani , suffered a lot. Her name was jytosana yagnik. She received death threats and her family was threatened.

[https://thewire.in/law/judge-who-convicted-modis-minister-in-riots-case-now-fears-for-her-family](https://thewire.in/law/judge-who-convicted-modis-minister-in-riots-case-now-fears-for-her-family)

If this is condition of opposition leader, then how can common man fight against govt. I am not supporter of any party, but this is clear misuses of institutions. According to defamation laws, only person who has been defamed can file it. So , lalit modi, nirav modi and narendra modi can only file it. And our PM has said even worse things in past. Now only supreme court will be able to give relief.

[https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/narendra-modi-says-manmohan-singh-just-a-night-watchman/articleshow/18783607.cms?from=mdr](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/narendra-modi-says-manmohan-singh-just-a-night-watchman/articleshow/18783607.cms?from=mdr)

"***considering the facts that...Kamlesh Paswan is a sitting MP and the judgments and orders (of the trial court)...will cast a stigma upon his political career, as such they have serious consequences"***
